1.1.0 (2017-04-12)
``````````````````

- Add support for the following ReDoc options:

  - ``lazy-rendering``
  - ``suppress-warnings``
  - ``hide-hostname``
  - ``required-props-first``
  - ``expand-responses``

  [:issue:`4`, :pr:`5`]

1.0.1 (2017-04-10)
``````````````````

- Do not copy assets (i.e. ``redoc.js``) to output directory if Sphinx build
  was finished with errors. [:issue:`1`]

1.0.0 (2017-04-08)
``````````````````

- First public release.
